Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Participates in electron transfer between P700 and the cytochrome b6-f complex in photosystem I. Has antiviral activity against Potato virus Y (strain N).

Literature.Title: Novel insight into the copper-ligand geometry in the crystal structure of Ulva pertusa plastocyanin at 1.6-A resolution. Structural basis for regulation of the copper site by residue 88.
Literature.Author: Shibata N, Inoue T, Nagano C, Nishio N, Kohzuma T, Onodera K, Yoshizaki F, Sugimura Y, Kai Y.
